lines.text:
[the revolutionaries have arrested Kordelin]
I've always been afraid. When I was a boy I was forecast that one day I would be very rich... but I would die in a gutter.
Someone should have a speech to our birthday boy. Who shall do it?
In a good way you get everything, in a bad you get nothing.
That's just what I've always said, haven't I.

[to the revolutionaries]
I have been poor. I have been so poor that you can't even imagine how poor I have bee. But I have never taken anything from the people. What I have taken, I haven taken from the rich.
You don't make money by tattling.
On my birthday no-one is allowed to speak politics.
What has happened here? What has happened here?

[to Allén]
I can't understand why did they shot Alfred. They should have shoot you. You are the one who is always wrangling.
